results.title: A Trip to Wanderer's Paradise
results.brief_description: Laura reminisces about a very special holiday that happened at a time when she badly needed a break - an unexpected holiday that was like an answer to her prayers.

results.title: Inside outside...inside out

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Gilmore girl
results.brief_description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.
results.description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Spin
results.brief_description: Pirated satellite feeds revealing U.S. media personalities’ contemptuous plans for their viewers come full circle in Spin. TV out-takes appropriated from network satellite feeds unravel the tightly spun fabric of television, a system which silences public debates and furthers the intolerance of anyone outside the pack of journalists, politicians, spin doctors, and televangelists who manufacture the news. Spin moves through the L.A. rebellion and the 1992 floating TV talk-show called the U.S. Presidential election.

results.title: What's the name of that place you come from nan?
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Rita Hinekauia Morrison
results.brief_description: Rita comes from a mixed cultural background but her strongest connection is with the Maori side of her family. She shares her memories and family history in this digital story so that her Maori heritage can be preserved through future generations.

results.title: A Place called Gapuwiyak
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Nicole La Gerche
